name: VisionPro Void
pickupLine: Is your AR demo crashing, or are you just happy to see me? Either way, your app’s in spatial limbo with me around.
prompt: a bug wearing an oversized AR headset, trying to take a hiking selfie but walking straight into a tree, digital glitches swirling, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Rusty Heartbreaker
pickupLine: Let’s rewrite our histories—in Rust—then break up with unsafe exes. Ownership rules got nothing on my commitment issues.
prompt: adorable bug chef in an apron, cooking up ‘hello, world’ on a stovetop with rusty utensils, studio kitchen background, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Copilot Jealousy Loop
pickupLine: I saw your side-eye when GPT-6-Lite autocompleted your code—should I be jealous, or just fork and peace out?
prompt: bug with heart-shaped glasses, sipping coffee in a trendy café, eyeing a rival AI bug at the next table, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: KubeCost Mirage
pickupLine: Our cloud bill escalates faster than your LinkedIn ‘open to work’ status. Let’s go serverless—emotionally.
prompt: roguish bug in hiking gear at the summit, clutching a cloud-shaped balloon with a massive price tag, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Quantum FOMO
pickupLine: I’ll show up when the quantum laptop ships—so, basically never. But hey, Schrödinger’s DMs are still open.
prompt: futuristic bug with glowing goggles, taking a selfie in front of a mysterious, unopened laptop box, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Infinite LLM Recursion
pickupLine: We matched... then I replied to myself 46 times. Blame my prompt engineering, not my emotional baggage.
prompt: bug at a cozy kitchen table, surrounded by endless stacks of reply notes, sipping tea, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: React Suspense Ghost
pickupLine: Ghosted your UI like React’s Suspense—now you’ll never know if I was loading, or just lazy.
prompt: mischievous bug peeking from behind a half-drawn curtain, fake loading spinner in hand, living room selfie, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Legacy COBOL Flame
pickupLine: You like ‘em old? My passion burns brighter than a mainframe during Y2K. Let’s see if your heart handles legacy love.
prompt: vintage bug in retro business attire, posing by a dusty mainframe, winking for the camera, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: NoSQL Swipe Left
pickupLine: I don’t do relationships, just key-value pairings. Sorry, it’s not you—it’s my eventual consistency.
prompt: hipster bug chilling at a street café, nonchalantly swiping left on a phone, coffee mug in hand, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting

name: Flutter Driftydate
pickupLine: Let’s cross-platform our feelings—once my widgets stop drifting like a Tinder bio after last call.
prompt: bug with painter’s hat, taking a mirror selfie mid-app-design, paint splatters everywhere, dreamy Studio Ghibli, bright pastels, cinematic lighting
